abstract: Aid to Allies program backed by Dickinson Coll faculty group
snippet: GENEVA, N.Y., May 31--More than half the members of the faculty of Hobart and William Smith Colleges gave out today a letter in which they expressed their belief that the United States should give to the Allies "at once and free of charge airplane...

headline.main: COLLEGE TEACHERS URGE AID TO ALLIES; Majority at Hobart Sign Appeal for Giving Planes, Material and Funds Free LEHIGH PLEA TO PRESIDENT Telegram Asks Him to Use Power 'as Commander in Chief'--Dickinson Group Acts

lead_paragraph: GENEVA, N.Y., May 31--More than half the members of the faculty of Hobart and William Smith Colleges gave out today a letter in which they expressed their belief that the United States should give to the Allies "at once and free of charge airplanes, material, and....
